org.ow2.proactive.scheduler.common.task

Interface TaskId

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<TaskId>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskIdImpl

    @PublicAPI
public interface TaskId
extends Comparable<TaskId>, Serializable
    Definition of a task identification.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 0.9

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ITERATION_SEPARATOR
      string separator in the task name for indicating the iteration index
      static String REPLICATION_SEPARATOR
      string separator in the task name for indicating the replication index

      • value

        String value()
        Returns a String representation that is unique for the job it is related to. Please look at toString() for a String representation unique for the scheduler instance it was built for.
        Returns:
        a String representation that is unique for the job it is related to only.

      • longValue

        long longValue()
        Returns a long representation that is unique for the job it is related to.
        Returns:
        a long representation that is unique for the job it is related to.

      • getIterationIndex

        int getIterationIndex()
        When Control Flow actions are performed on Tasks, some tasks are replicated. A task replicated by a FlowActionType.IF action is differentiated from the original by an incremented Iteration Index. This index is reflected in the readable name of the Task's id (getReadableName()), this methods safely extracts it and returns it as an int.
        Returns:
        the iteration number of this task if it was replicated by a IF flow operation (>= 0)

      • getReplicationIndex

        int getReplicationIndex()
        When Control Flow actions are performed on Tasks, some tasks are replicated. A task replicated by a FlowActionType.REPLICATE action is differentiated from the original by an incremented Replication Index. This index is reflected in the readable name of the Task's id (getReadableName()), this methods safely extracts it and returns it as an int.
        Returns:
        the iteration number of this task if it was replicated by a IF flow operation (>= 0)

      • toString

        String toString()
        Returns a String representation that is unique for the scheduler instance it was built for.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        a String representation that is unique for the scheduler instance it was built for.
